description: 859 - Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
comments: This contract was competitively sourced. This contract includes one or more amendments. Architectural consultant to 1 provide assistance with the tender process; 2 give two presentations of the project Executive request; 3 provide a distinct invitation to tender document for the North Parking; 4 memorial park of Canada in France ; 5 underground parking north of the building in the park, at the Vimy Ridge National Historic Site of Canada, Vimy, France.
